definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: The vegetable farmers space out the Chinese cabbage about 30cm apart.
sentences.chinese: 菜農每隔約30公分種一顆大白菜。

sentences.english: A North Korean soldier stared at them from just a few centimeters away, through a window.
sentences.chinese: 一名北韓軍人在幾公分外的窗口另一側注視着他們。

sentences.english: Human brains have more than 100 million cells per cubic centimeter.
sentences.chinese: 人腦每立方公分有一億多個細胞。

sentences.english: Make a 24 cm –diameter circle on foil.
sentences.chinese: 用錫紙做一個24公分的圓形圈。

sentences.english: These steel rods have an average length of 150 cm.
sentences.chinese: 這些鋼棒的平均長度爲150公分。

sentences.english: Species range from 6 to 24 in. (15-60 cm) long.
sentences.chinese: 體型大小從約15公分到約60公分都有。

sentences.english: Species range from 6 to 24 in. (15-60 cm) long.
sentences.chinese: 體型大小從約15公分到約60公分都有。

sentences.english: After treatment of argon-helium knife, tumor was shrunken to 5cm.
sentences.chinese: 經過氬氦刀治療以後，腫瘤只剩下5公分。

sentences.english: Two plastic 10cm-diameter hemispheres, each with a sturdy handy, make up this device.
sentences.chinese: 此裝置是包含兩個直徑10公分的朔膠半圓球。

sentences.english: The full length - from the top bead to the bottom of the heart - is around 9cm.
sentences.chinese: 從最頂端的珠珠到愛心的底部約9公分。

sentences.english: Roll out dough and cut 20 cm diametre discs.
sentences.chinese: 將麪糰杆平並切成直徑20公分的圓餅。

sentences.english: Eyeing the four-inch-thick wad of paper, I felt a wave of despair.
sentences.chinese: 望着這沓足足十公分厚的信紙，我忽然認爲一陣失望。
然後把它們切成1公分厚度的片。

sentences.english: Human females have two ovaries, almond-shaped organs about 1.5 in. (4 cm) long.
sentences.chinese: 人類有兩個卵巢，呈杏仁形，長約4公分。

definition: thick and thin/coarse and fine/thickness (caliber)/coarseness/quality of work
thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress
cun (Chinese unit of length equal to ⅓ decimeter)
